A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I had to register to this website purely for supporting this amazingly entertaining movie. I always say I won't rewatch SW\, because I enjoyed them as a kid\, as I have been less demanding viewer back then and I don't want to spoil all the good memories. 
However\, with this movie I felt like that content kid again\, meaning it not only fulfilled\, but surpassed my expectations. It was funny\, touching\, thoughtful\, filled with good action. I like that the movie does not take itself too seriously as well.
 I see that most of viewers have troubles with ambiguity - mostly regarding Luke. This is what I loved about it too\, I thrive in moral ambiguity. Others are angry with "Social Justice Warriors and feminnist propaganda". Well\, fuck those guys. 
All in all\, everyone did a marvelous job. The only problem was pacing /sometimes/ and till the end it felt a bit lengthy\, but that is just a trivial detail.
I have only one wish. Please\, do not dumb down the sequel to cater to those who disliked the movie.
